sentence.text: Considering the pivotal role of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II signaling in the colon epithelium both physiologically and pathologically, the correlation between H19 and VDR signaling may have an important role in the development of colon cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In this study, the correlation between H19 and vitamin D receptor (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) signaling and the underlying mechanisms in colon cancer were investigated both in vitro and in vivo.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
